required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Assess the Effects of Non Digestible Carbohydrates on Long-Term Glucose Homeostasis in Untreated Prediabetic Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: Randomized, Double-Blinded, Placebo-Controlled Study to Assess the Effects of Short-Chain Fructo-Oligosaccharides on Long-Term Glucose Homeostasis in Untreated Prediabetic Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: This clinical study aims to prove that the efficacy of non digestible carbohydrates supplementation (daily dose of 20 grams consumed twice a day for 12 weeks) on the regulation of glucose homeostasis is superior than placebo in prediabetic subjects.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: multicentre randomized, parallel arms, double-blind, placebo-controlled clinical trial
study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.time_frame: V2 (randomization) and V5 (12 weeks of intervention)
primary_outcome.description: Change from baseline of Hba1c level (%)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: V2 (randomization), V3 (4 weeks of intervention), V4 (8 weeks of intervention) and V5 (12 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Absolute variations of Hba1c level (%)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: V2 (randomization), V3 (4 weeks of intervention), V4 (8 weeks of intervention) and V5 (12 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline of fasting glycemia (g/L)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: V2 (randomization), V3 (4 weeks of intervention), V4 (8 weeks of intervention) and V5 (12 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline of fasting insulinemia (mU/L)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: V2 (randomization), V3 (4 weeks of intervention), V4 (8 weeks of intervention) and V5 (12 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline of fructosamine (μmol/L)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: V2 (randomization), V3 (4 weeks of intervention), V4 (8 weeks of intervention) and V5 (12 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline of HOMA-IR (Homeostasis Model Assessment of Insulin) and QUICKI (Quantitative Insulin sensitivity Check Index) indices

secondary_outcome.time_frame: V2 (randomization) and V5 (12 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline of insulin sensitivity index (ISI)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: V2 (randomization) and V5 (12 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline of glycemia level (g/L)

secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline of iAUC of glycemia (g/L)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: V2 (randomization) and V5 (12 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline of insulinemia levels (mU/L)

secondary_outcome.measure: Incremental Area Under the Curve (iAUC) of insulinemia
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V2 (randomization) and V5 (12 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline of iAUC of insulinemia (mU/L)

secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline of GLP-1 levels (pmol/L)

secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline of total lean mass (g and %)

secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline of total fat mass (g and %)

secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline of bone mineral density (g/cm2)

secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline of total body mass (kg)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: V2 (randomization), V3 (4 weeks of intervention), V4 (8 weeks of intervention) and V5 (12 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline of weight (in kg)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: V2 (randomization), V3 (4 weeks of intervention), V4 (8 weeks of intervention) and V5 (12 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline of BMI (in kg/m2)

secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline of waist and hip Circumference (in cm)

secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline of Waist to Hip ratio and Waist to Height ratio

secondary_outcome.time_frame: V2 (randomization) and V5 (12 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Change on satiety and appetite sensation using 100-mm VAS to complete 15 min before the meal, 30 min, 60 min, 120 min, 180 min and 240 min after the meal at which study product was consumed

secondary_outcome.time_frame: V2 (randomization), V3 (4 weeks of intervention), V4 (8 weeks of intervention) and V5 (12 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline of total energy intake - TEI (kcal/day)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: V2 (randomization), V3 (4 weeks of intervention), V4 (8 weeks of intervention) and V5 (12 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline of percentage of energy intake from fat, carbohydrates and protein (g and %TEI)

secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline of percentage of percentage of fiber (g)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: V2 (randomization), V3 (4 weeks of intervention), V4 (8 weeks of intervention) and V5 (12 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline of percentage of percentage of alcohol intake (absolute quantities, g/day)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: V2 (randomization), V3 (4 weeks of intervention), V4 (8 weeks of intervention) and V5 (12 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline of high-sensitivity C-reactive Protein (CRPhs) (mg/L)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: V2 (randomization) and V5 (12 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline microbiota composition for alpha-diversity indices (Shannon and Chao indices) and abundances at the phylum, family and genus level assessed by 16S metabarcoding (in a subgroup of 30 subjects only)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: V2 (randomization) and V5 (12 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline of fermentative activity of the intestinal microbiota assessed by measuring short-chain fatty acids concentrations in stool (in the same subgroup of 30 subjects only)

other_outcome.time_frame: V1 (Inclusion), V2 (randomization), V3 (4 weeks of intervention), V4 (8 weeks of intervention) and V5 (12 weeks of intervention)
other_outcome.description: Number of adverse events (including gastro-intestinal symptoms) by subject that appeared during the entire duration of the study

other_outcome.time_frame: V2 (randomization), V3 (4 weeks of intervention), V4 (8 weeks of intervention) and V5 (12 weeks of intervention)
V2 (randomization), V3 (4 weeks of intervention), V4 (8 weeks of intervention) and V5 (12 weeks of intervention)
other_outcome.description: Change from baseline of Systolic Blood Pressure and Diastolic Blood Pressure (mmHg)

arm_group.description: Food ingredient containing non digestible carbohydrates, in shape of powder
Food ingredient containing containing 95% of maltodextrin

intervention.description: the subjects will consume 2 bags of 10 grams per day of the product: 1 bag in the morning and 1 bag at lunch or in the evening, at the beginning of the meal, diluted in a large glass of beverage, during 12 weeks.

the subjects will consume 2 bags of 10 grams per day of the product: 1 bag in the morning and 1 bag at lunch or in the evening, at the beginning of the meal, diluted in a large glass of beverage, during 12 weeks.
